description:
PiskelApp: Pixel Art Made Easy is a short and quick to the point as to why you should start using the Piskel App for your own personal and business use! The course will continually be updated and more content will be added over time! Start making pixel art and animation fast and easy with Piskel App's drawing tools! Piskel App is a really quick way to not only easy to make pixel art but you can do it on and offline! With it's easy to use interface and customizable palletes Piskel App has it! In this course you will jump right into the program learning examples from the instructor and best methods to get fast results!

Please note - This course does not show you drawing techniques or teach you how to animate. However, the instructor will use techniques that will show you how to easily get started and make your retro style art come to life!

================================

About this course: This course is going to be continually updated with more and more content upon request In this course you will quickly understand the drawing tools of Piskel App and start drawing today! This course is no-fluff, straight to the point to show you exactly how Piskel App works

Materials you will need:

  • Mouse or drawing tablet
  • Internet connection

You will learn:

  • What frames are and how to use them
  • How to use fast techniques for adding color: such as highlights and shadow to your drawing The layers palette and how it works
  • To easily start drawing with easy to use drawing tools.
  • How to set up your drawing canvas for recommended drawing and resolution size
  • How to quickly start making pixel art
  • ...and much more!
title: PiskelApp: Pixel Art Made Easy Crash Course
